summary:
Now, you must search for the enchanted rings or necklace.
Becaunse you cannot enchant to Jewelries by yourself.
So you can enjoy adventure of treasure hunting !!
descriptionHtml:
Now, you must search for the enchanted rings or necklace.
Becaunse you cannot enchant to Jewelries by yourself.

( But, there is a little exception.
You can enchant "Fortify Barter" or "Resist Magic" to your necklace.
You can enchant "Fortify Unarmed" to your ring.)

So you can enjoy adventure of treasure hunting !!
author: SasameSnow
